summary: Dietary fiber plays a crucial role in managing diseases and preventing obesity. The recommended daily intake for adults is 25-35 grams, but the average intake remains below 20 grams. summary: Mars Express recently flew over the Mawrth Vallis region on Mars, capturing image data that can be used to observe changes on the planet's surface. summary: The Curiosity rover on Mars is conducting a detailed imaging campaign and contact science to gain insight into the origin of craters and target rocks. The rover will also acquire a long distance ChemCam RMI mosaic and conduct environmental monitoring activities. The goal is to gather more information for further crater science next week.
title: Sols 3895-3897: Navigating Through the Crater Cluster
